files.patch:
@@ -1579,1 +1579,9 @@
-    ld_st2(as_Register(pfop), adr, size, op);                   \
+    if (adr.getMode() == Address::literal) {                    \
+      starti;                                                   \
+      f(0b11, 31, 30), f(0b011, 29, 27), f(0b000, 26, 24);      \
+      f(pfop, 4, 0);                                            \
+      int64_t offset = (adr.target() - pc()) >> 2;              \
+      sf(offset, 23, 5);                                        \
+    } else {                                                    \
+      ld_st2(as_Register(pfop), adr, size, op);                 \
+    }                                                           \
